[00:00.00]Here Tonight - Brett Young
[00:02.22]Hmmmm
[00:09.00]If ever I get lost in your eyes tonight
[00:19.05]Please just let me stay right there a little bit longer
[00:28.98]Underneath the stars we are on fire
[00:39.03]And I don't wanna go if you don't wanna go
[00:44.74]We can just stay here in this minute
[00:47.74]Lose all track of time
[00:49.93]Let the world spin on without us for a while
[00:53.79]I'm telling you we're just one kiss away from heaven
[00:57.50]So baby hold on tight
[01:00.11]'Cause I want to get wrapped up in your love
[01:03.78]So baby
[01:05.45]Let's just stay here tonight

[ti:Here Tonight]
[ar:Brett Young]

[00:00.00]//
[00:02.22]//
[00:09.00]如果我被你的眼神迷惑了
[00:19.05]就请让我在你的魅力下多沉醉一会儿
[00:28.98]星空下的我们 热血沸腾
[00:39.03]只要你不想走 我就不走
[00:44.74]这一刻我们就呆在这里
[00:47.74]彻底忘记时间
[00:49.93]让我们暂时逃离这个世界
[00:53.79]我要告诉你 只差一个吻 我们就可以感受到幸福
[00:57.50]所以 宝贝 紧紧抱着我
[01:00.11]因为我想沉浸在你的爱里
